modroles.name: Mod Roles
modroles.desc: Set Mod Roles which can use moderation commands
modroles.exp: @role isAdmin(0/false or 1/true) isMod(0/false or 1/true) isHelper(0/false or 1/true)

add.name: Add link to Scamlist

delete.name: Delete link from Scamlist

view.desc: Check if a link already exits on Scamlist
